borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Formal application for an extension of time to allow planning permission to be extended until 1st May 2021 in accordance with the Business and Planning Act 2020.  In respect to the Governments Extension of certain planning permissions guidance, Section 12,  provided is the following details on behalf of Mr and Mrs Lowell. This includes,1.         The planning permission to which the application relates;  2016/04635/FUL,  Full Planning Permission granted 10 May 20172.         The condition(s) which set out the time limit(s) for implementation:  Particulars of Decision, Condition 1)3.         Any condition(s) or other agreements which relate to environmental mitigation or enhancement measures;  Not applicable 4.         Whether the original permission was subject to an Environmental Impact Assessment and/or a Habitats Regulation Assessment, or screening for either type of assessment;  Not applicable  Original Description;Erection of an infill extension at lower ground floor level to the front elevation; installation of porthole windows to the sides of the main front steps; installation of a new door to replace the existing window at lower ground floor level  to the side of the front  steps; formation of steps to the new lower ground floor entrance door; installation of handrails on both sides of the main front entrance steps, installation of railings to the side boundaries to the front of the property;  associated landscaping including permeable surfacing to the front garden; re-instatement of finial to (RHS) gate pier.
